OptionResult.DiaryEntry: Well, we worked so hard on %Pron:1:3% math homework I was basically falling asleep and then literally set my hair on fire! We put it out quickly but it didn’t stop me from getting burnt. But my kid and I had a good laugh over it.

OptionResult.DiaryEntry: I got a lot of stuff done and finally got around to reading a book I wanted to read. It was nice to have time to myself but I do feel badly since my kid seems upset that I didn’t help %Pron:1:2%.
